text: Look at him go! Theo Wargo / Getty Images Harry Styles performed two songs during the Victoria's Secret Fashion Show. His funky dance moves really stood out. People on Twitter seemed to love them more than the runway show itself. Harry Styles performed two songs during the Victoria's Secret Fashion Show — and his quirky dance moves stole all the attention away from the models. During the show — which was held in Shanghai, China, and televised on CBS Tuesday night — Styles clearly enjoyed himself while he sang the songs ` ` Kiwi'' and ` ` Only Angel'' from his recent self - titled album. He played ` ` Kiwi'' first. Theo Wargo / Getty Images Styles sang ` ` Only Angel'' during the show's finale. Theo Wargo / Getty Images He
